          <title>
            <string language="en">The see-saw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der See-saw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La balançoir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O balanço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'altalena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δείτε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El balancín</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the two factors affecting the moment: the force and the distance from the pivot point.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Moment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die zwei Faktoren, die den 
Moment beeinflussen: die Kraft und der Abstand vom Gelenk 
zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les deux facteurs 
affectant le moment : la force et la distance du pivot se 
dirigent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os dois fatores que 
afetam o momento: a força e a distância do pivô apontam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i due fattori che 
interessano il momento: la forza e la distanza dal perno 
indicano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο παράγοντες που έχουν
επιπτώσεις στη στιγμή: η δύναμη και η απόσταση από το 
σημείο άξονα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los dos factores que 
afectan el momento: la fuerza y la distancia del pivote 
señalan.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
